item.description:
Hello Boston,

BPO invites you to yet another exclusive & stylish Bollywood Night at the OM Restaurant / Lounge on Friday, November 2nd, 2012. Come celebrate India's Festive Season with Deejay Bomaby. Get crazy with a fusion of nostalgia as the DJ remixes the classics and newest hits.

We have a special $10 cover for all those who RSVP and arrive before 11 PM. You can RSVP with your guest names to bpobollywood@gmail.com.

Please note we have limited spots and guests with RSVPâ€™s will be given priority

Time: 10.15 PM to 2 AM.
Dress Code: Black Dress or Black Tie. No shorts/hats/t-shirts/sneakers. Dress to impress.

Don't forget to join us on Facebook (www.1bpo.org) to stay updated with all our events and early bird specials.

Best,

BPO
item.name: BPO Black Dress Bollywood Party
